hadiths.text: It was narratd from Abu Hurairah that :the Prophet (ﷺ) used to say: "Al-hamdu lillahi 'ala kulli hal. Rabbi a'udhu bika min hali ahlin-nar (Praise is to Allah in all circumstances, O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the situation of the people of Hell)

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Those Who Praise Allah
